title: Alzheimer’s Screening Takes a Leap with Japan’s Machine Learning Model
description: In a groundbreaking development, Japan-based Oita University and pharmaceutical company Eisai Co. have unveiled the world’s inaugural machine learning model designed to predict the accumulation of amyloid beta (Aβ) in the brain, a pivotal pathological factor in Alzheimer’s disease (AD).  This revolutionary model leverages data collected from wristband sensors to easily screen brain Aβ accumulation […]

title: Harnessing Conversational AI for a Competitive Edge in 2024
description: AI is poised to revolutionize the retail landscape in 2024, becoming a cornerstone for industry leaders striving to enhance customer experiences and streamline operational efficiency. The National Retail Federation’s forecast for 2023 holiday sales growth, ranging between 3 percent and 4 percent, underscores the pressing need for retailers to innovate and stay competitive. Conversational AI: […]

title: Microsoft Edge and Bing Users Engage in Over 1.9 Billion Copilot Chats in 2023
description: In 2023, Microsoft Edge and Bing users have actively engaged in more than 1.9 billion Copilot chats, marking a significant milestone for the Redmond-based tech giant. According to a recent blog post by Roger Capriotti, the General Manager of Browser and Search Marketing/Growth at Microsoft, these Copilot chats reached a staggering volume that rivaled the […]

title: Archiving Feature Introduced in ChatGPT for Enhanced Privacy
description: In a move aimed at providing users with increased control over their conversations, OpenAI has rolled out a new archiving feature for ChatGPT. This feature enables users to easily hide and access their chats, enhancing privacy and organization within the platform.  Available on both the web and iOS versions of ChatGPT, this functionality simplifies the […]

title: Invest Qatar and Microsoft launch AI.SHA, an AI investment assistant
description: In a pioneering move, the Investment Promotion Agency Qatar (Invest Qatar) has partnered with Microsoft to introduce Ai.SHA, is an innovative AI-powered assistant leveraging GPT capabilities through the Azure OpenAI service. This collaboration positions Invest Qatar at the forefront of global investment promotion agencies, embracing advanced technology to redefine professional interactions between investors and businesses […]

title: Litecoin’s 2024 Prospects: Will LTC Surge Beyond $72?
description: Analysts have subjected Litecoin to a comprehensive analysis and observed that the asset may not stage any unprecedented price surge in the near term.  According to them, almost all technical indicators show a bearish sign. Litecoin (LTC) is known as one of the most undervalued cryptos in the market with a current price of $75.07. [...]
